field.long_name: Total melt from ice and snow

field.name: snowage

field.name: snowage_glob
field.long_name: Snow age on total area including snow on vegetated and bare soil and nobio area

field.name: frac_snow

field.name: aveget

field.name: aveget5k
field.long_name: Availability of data for the Olson vegetation fraction interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: frac_bare
field.long_name: Bare soil fraction for each PFT

field.name: dss
field.long_name: Depth of dry soil in top reservoir

field.name: mrsos
field.long_name: Moisture in top 10cm (6 top soil layers with CWRR)

field.name: gpp
field.long_name: Net assimilation of carbon by the vegetation

field.name: gppGrass
field.long_name: Gross Primary Production on grass tiles

field.name: gppCrop
field.long_name: Gross Primary Production on crop tiles

field.name: gppTree
field.long_name: Gross Primary Production on tree tiles

field.name: diffevap
field.long_name: Difference betwence vevapp and composing fluxes in enerbil

field.name: dtes

field.name: vbeta4_pft
field.long_name: Beta for bare soil each pft

field.name: humrel
field.long_name: Soil moisture stress for transpiration (it is not the relative humidity)

field.name: evspsblsoi
field.long_name: Water Evaporation from soil and sublimation

field.name: baresoilFrac
field.long_name: Fraction of entire grid cell covered by bare soil PFT(pft=1)

field.name: residualFrac
field.long_name: Fraction of entire grid cell that is land but neither vegetation-covered nor bare soil (nobio)

field.name: PAR
field.long_name: Photosynthetic active radiation, half of swdown

field.name: PARsuntab
field.long_name: PAR received by sun leaves over LAI layers

field.name: PARshtab
field.long_name: PAR received by shaded leaves over LAI layers

field.name: coszang
field.long_name: Cosine of the solar zenith angle

field.name: CRF
field.long_name: Canopy reduction factor for net NO flux calculation

field.name: flx_co2_bbg_year

field.name: N_qt_WRICE_year
field.long_name: N fertilizers applied on wetland rice - Read in an input file

field.name: achem_co2
field.long_name: Availability of data for the co2 bbg interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: flx_ORVOC

field.name: flx_othermono
field.long_name: Emissions of other monoterpenes from vegetation

field.name: flx_fertil_no
field.long_name: Biogenic nitrogen oxide soil emission due to N-fertilisation

field.name: flx_no_soil
field.long_name: Nitrogen Oxide emissions from soil, before deposition on canopy

field.name: flx_no

field.name: fco2
field.long_name: Function for CO2 impact on BVOC (isoprene)

field.name: LAImean

field.name: SoilSat
field.long_name: Mean volumetric water content at saturation

field.name: water2infilt
field.long_name: Storage of surface runoff kept for future infiltration(already included in humtot)

field.name: snowtemp_weighted
field.long_name: mean snow temperature weighted by snow density

field.name: snowliqtot
field.long_name: Snow liquid content integrated over snow depth where land

field.name: turfac
field.long_name: soil water stress for crop phenology

field.name: swfac
field.long_name: soil water stress for crop phenology

field.name: basinmap
field.long_name: Aproximate map of the river basins

field.name: nbrivers
field.long_name: Number or rivers in the outflow grid box

field.name: mask_coast
field.long_name: Mask of coastal gridcell which can recieve coastalflow

field.name: riverflow_cpl
field.long_name: River flow to the oceans, variable distributed over a time period before sent to ocean.

field.name: lake_overflow

field.long_name: Water overflow when lake reservoir exceeds maximum capacity distributed on coast grid cells

field.long_name: Mean of storage change in fast flow reservoir accumulated over each day

field.long_name: Mean of storage change for slow flow reservoir accumulated over each day

field.long_name: Mean of storage change in all routing reservoirs accumulated each day
